common.do_not_reply: This mail is automatically sent by the system, please do not reply directly.

Schedule: {{.schedule}}

template_6.html: {{.walletcurrency}} Wallet {{.walletname}} has a scheulde withdraw transaction needs your approval

template_7.subject: Account created for {{.user_name}} on CYBAVO VAULT
template_7.html:
Dear {{.user_name}},

Your account has been created. {{if .password}}The following information help you to activate your account.{{else}}Please open the login website and continue as guest by the login account.{{end}}

    Login website: {{.website}}
    Login account: {{.email}}
{{if .password}}
    Default password: {{.password}}

NOTICE: For the first time, you have to use Desktop browser to perform login and activation for Mobile app. 

Steps:
1. Use desktop or laptop browser to browser the login website
2. Login by the account and default password
3. Change the default password and re-login to the system
4. Follow the wizard to install CYBAVO Authenticator app on your mobile phone
5. Scan QR code which display on website to pair with your CYBAVO Authenticator app
6. Setup your personal wallet PIN CODE * Most Important! Please remember your PIN Code as well *
7. Change language for your preference on the website
8. You are all set. Done. {{end}}

Thank you for choosing CYBAVO's service to protect your digital asset!

template_9.subject: Security alert [Login fail too many times]
template_9.text:
Dear {{.user_name}},

Your account just tried to login with wrong password too many times, so the system locked the login behavior.
Unlock it by clicking the following link and then you can do the login again
{{.url}}
The link will be expired in 15 minutes.
template_9.html:
Dear {{.user_name}},

Your account just tried to login with wrong password too many times, so the system locked the login behavior.

Unlock it by clicking the following link and then you can do the login again

{{.url}}

The link will be expired in 15 minutes.

template_10.subject: Security alert [{{.user}} login fail too many times]
template_10.text:

User {{.user}}({{.email}}) just tried to login with wrong password too many times, so the system locked the login behavior.

template_46.subject: Unlock Policy Cold Time - Your Verification Code
template_46.text:
Dear {{.user_name}},

You requested to unlock the 72 hours cold time on a wallet policy change.
Please use the following verification code

{{.digitalnum}}

If you did not request this unlock, we recommend changing your password and contacting support@cybavo.com immediately.

Thank you
